response.job_title: Mechatronics Engineer
response.summary:
I love to create and love to solve problems. When I do something, I like to do it well and not by halves. I am a creative engineer with great initiative and great taste for learning.

I am passionate about thinking and knowing how things work in depth. I am motivated by challenges and learning. Faced with a difficult problem, with persistence, method, and creativity, I know that I can come up with a solution, I think this is the most rewarding thing in engineering.

I have work experience as a software developer and advanced Python skills. I have interests and knowledge in robotics, automation, mechatronics design, data science, software development, embedded systems, and any combination of the above. Still, I am adaptable and like to learn and combine engineering with other disciplines.

My professional purpose at the moment is to find projects and people that satisfy my curiosity and allow me to learn and improve continuously. In the near future, I am looking for a master's degree that will allow me to combine and deepen my knowledge in robotics, mechatronics design, embedded systems, and machine learning.

I am currently available for new work projects, please do not hesitate to contact me.
response.skills: Automatización industrial, Programación, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Ingeniería, Automatización, Diseño de sistemas de control, Visión por computador, Robótica, Python, Java, C++, Programación en C, Autodesk Inventor, Autodesk Fusion 360, LaTeX, Matlab, Simulink, Microcontroladores, Arduino, Sistemas embebidos

company.name: CSG Forte
company.description:
At CSG Forte, we help our customers grow their businesses quickly and scale payments smarter with a unified payments platform. Our platform seamlessly adapts to meet your evolving needs, while reducing complexity and cutting costs. With our experience, world-class technology and vast ecosystem of partners, we have the solutions and skills to grow alongside your business. 

A little bit more about us:
-	20+ years of experience
-	81,000+ merchants supported across the U.S.
-	$84 billion in payments processed annually
-	173 million transactions processed annually

At CSG Forte, we work better together. Thousands of government, telecom, insurance and other industry merchants trust CSG Forte as their digital payments solution provider of choice, including Charter Communications, DISH, Gexa Energy, Kinston North Carolina and SedonaOffice.

Our award-winning, Nacha-preferred payments solution allows companies to process omnichannel payments and offer agnostic payment acceptance, online, in person and over the phone. And we continue to raise the bar— among our 2022 wins, CSG Forte was ranked Best Performing Gateway as well as Best of Breed API by The Strawhecker Group.

From small and medium-sized businesses, to integrated software vendors (ISVs) and Fortune 500 enterprises, we have the experience and solutions to fit your needs to process payments faster, smarter and at scale.

profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
instaleap.io is a SAS platform that automates the last-mile logistics grocery delivery process.

I had the opportunity to be part of the team that started the platform and I was given the responsibility of leading a team of (initially) 3 developers including myself. 

Our team had the responsibility of delivering the order management system (OMS) that had all the business logic for the order life cycle, including change of status, assign and informing who were responsible for each order, cancellation policy, among many others.

After just 9 months of starting the platform and 3 months of being in operation, our OMS have managed +3k orders from retailers on three different countries and that number is increasing each day.

The value I considered I added to the team has the following main components.

- Software Design: I helped the team to architect the system and more importantly, evolve the initial design, refactor and iterate over it so that it would support the new coming requirements by making design meetings and important design decisions. 

- Software Quality: I helped the team to achieve high quality code, focusing on testability, readability and performance by introducing the practice of code review, continuous refactoring, cleaning and testing.

- Requirements Specification: I helped the product management team to define the required effort to implement certain requirements so that we could agree on a plan to implement the most valuable features given the time constraints.

- Mentorship: I decided who implemented some features or requirements and I did that following the mindset of helping a developer grow by increasing the difficulty of the tasks progressively. Also, guide new comers to get involved quickly in the project, learn and increase their skill set.   

 We implemented the system using Typescript, NodeJS and PostgreSQL
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
I was part of a team that maintained several systems of mercadoni.com (before it went out of business). Those systems were distributed systems that followed a service oriented architecture.

Main effort:
We had the problem of not knowing the true logic behind the payment scheme, as the payment service was a true legacy system and the responsibility was shared between many services so,
- I Designed and Implemented part of a new payment flow that would centralize the payment logic in just one service, solving the issue of not knowing why the payments were the way they were but more importantly, being able to easily adapt the payment rules to future necessities.

Maintenance effort:
- Fixed several bugs on the logistics and payment services.
- Recover the application from crashes of legacy systems and make temporary patches to keep them working.

The systems were mainly written in JavaScript with NodeJS and a mixture of MongoDB and PostgreSQL as databases.

company.name: Microsoft
company.description:
Every company has a mission. What's ours? To empower every person and every organization to achieve more. We believe technology can and should be a force for good and that meaningful innovation contributes to a brighter world in the future and today. Our culture doesn’t just encourage curiosity; it embraces it. Each day we make progress together by showing up as our authentic selves. We show up with a learn-it-all mentality. We show up cheering on others, knowing their success doesn't diminish our own. We show up every day open to learning our own biases, changing our behavior, and inviting in differences. When we show up, we achieve more together. 

Microsoft operates in 190 countries and is made up of more than 220,000 passionate employees worldwide.

response.job_title: Psicólogo clínico en fundacion soscial santa maria
response.summary:
Psicólogo con amplio conocimiento en el área clínica y social comunitaria, énfasis
en los diferentes aspectos que aborda el trabajo con población vulnerable, diseño
y desarrollo de programas enmarcados en la promoción de la salud y prevención
de la enfermedad, Habilidades para el trabajo interdisciplinario y el manejo de
relaciones interpersonales, además de amplio conocimiento en el área
organizacional, énfasis en los diferentes aspectos que aborda la planeación de los
recursos humanos en las organizaciones e interés por la actualización profesional.

profile_positions.description:
Prestación de servicio como psicólogo en el área clínica en énfasis comportamental con enfoque cognitivo conductual, brindando acompañamiento y atención a nivel individual y grupal a niños, niñas, adolescentes y mayores de 18 años que presentan una condición de discapacidad mental psicosocial y cognitiva realizando las siguientes acciones: 

	Elaboración de planes  de atención integral de los usuarios (PLATIN) por requerimiento del ICBF.
	Guiar y apoyar procesos terapéuticos y de auto cuidado de los usuarios
	Realización de entrevistas y valoraciones psicológicas
	Evoluciones mensuales en historias clínicas de los usuarios según el proceso terapéutico.
	Realización de talleres grupales según el plan de atención institucional PAI
	Recibimiento y acogida de nuevos usuarios, realizando acompañamiento al proceso de adaptación al medio institucional.
	Elaboración y ejecución de proyectos de vida de los usuarios
profile_positions.title: Psicólogo clínico

profile_positions.description:
Prestar los servicios profesionales en el área de psicología para apoyar la gestión
de la comisaria de familia y demás dependencias que así lo requieran.
Ψ Brindar asesoría psicológica en el área familiar
Ψ Intervención en crisis a través de sesiones psicoterapéuticas en casos
de riesgo, intento de suicidio, consumo de SPA
Ψ Apoyo en el área legal durante las medidas de protección y alimentos
para menores
Ψ Valoración psicológica a menores o adultos en casos de violencia
intrafamiliar, conflictos de pareja, separación, abuso sexual.
Ψ Asistencia a Instituciones educativas para dictar charlas de VIF,
maltrato, abuso sexual, conductas inapropiadas.
Ψ Realizar estudios, visitas domiciliarias y emitir conceptos sobre
conductas de los usuarios que requieran el apoyo psicosocial

Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Mercado Libre is Latin America’s leading e-commerce technology company.  Through its primary platforms, MercadoLibre.com and MercadoPago.com, it provides solutions to individuals and companies buying, selling, advertising, and paying for goods online.    
Mercado Libe serves millions of users and creates a market for a wide variety of goods and services in an easy, safe and efficient way.  
MercadoLibre maintains a leadership position in 18 Latin American countries.  The Company listed on Nasdaq (NASDAQ: MELI) following its initial public offering in 2007.

company.name: KONCILI
company.description:
Koncili, created and developed by DB1 Group, is the first payment reconciliation software for marketplaces in Brazil that guarantees control of the commissions you receive. You exchange sales, transfers, rules and commissions spreadsheets for just a few clicks.

Even selling several products on several marketplaces, you’ll be sure and confident that transfers received are just right. The objective is to check if there is a difference in commissions and to control the receivables between marketplaces and ecommerces in an automated, agile and practical way. With Koncili you’ll reduce the operational effort so that your company grows structured, being able to reconcile large volumes with a few clicks.

Koncili has direct integration with Vtex, Skyhub and ANYMARKET, integration hub for marketplaces, more than 1K active customers including Samsung, Netshoes, Levi's, Reserva, Centauro, Livraria Cultura, Saraiva, L'oréal, Technos and LePostiche, being considered as a reference in the market, connecting companies to the largest online retailers such as Amazon, Mercado Livre, Netshoes, Submarino, Shoptime, Americanas, Via Varejo, among others.

response.job_title: M.Sc. on Engineering and Construction Management - Technical Management - Planning and Estimating Management - BIM Enthusiastic - PMP/Lean Thinker
response.summary: I am an outstanding leader in the construction industry with a proven track record in technical direction, cost engineering, and project management. With over 11 years of experience, I have successfully led multidisciplinary teams in the development of high-quality residential, commercial, and urban projects with cumulative investments exceeding 500 million USD, over 1 million square meters built, and more than 20,000 housing units. I possess exceptional managerial skills demonstrated through the creation and direction of high-performing teams, driving efficiency and productivity across all project phases. My strategic and results-oriented approach has made a significant impact, ensuring the successful completion of projects within tight deadlines and with high quality standards. As an advocate for innovation, I have successfully implemented BIM methodologies to optimize processes, ensure planning accuracy, and foster multidisciplinary collaboration. Through the implementation of advanced data analysis tools and business intelligence, I have gained valuable insights for strategic and disruptive decision-making in the construction sector, enabling me to identify opportunities, mitigate risks, and improve operational efficiency. My deep understanding of the market and its influencing factors has allowed me to develop solid and adaptive growth strategies, positioning the organizations I have worked with as industry leaders. With a focus on excellence and continuous improvement, I excel in tackling challenges and successfully leading large-scale projects.
response.skills: People Development, Technical Expertise, Value Creation, Data Analytics and Business Intelligence, Market Analysis and Benchmarking, Strategic Planning and Decision-Making, Team Leadership, BIM Implementation, Stakeholder Collaboration, BIM (Building Information Modeling), Project Planning and Scheduling, Budgeting, Interdisciplinary Collaboration, Construction Industry Knowledge, Stakeholder Management, Construction Technology, Quality Assurance, Risk Management, Data Analysis, Continuous Improvement

profile_positions.description:
• I lead a multidisciplinary team of over 30 professionals in 5 key technical areas, including architectural design, technical coordination, budget and scheduling, BIM implementation, and permitting.
• I efficiently manage a portfolio of over 30 residential and urban development projects at various stages of development and geographic locations, prioritizing tasks, allocating resources, and maintaining a disciplined approach to achieving established goals.
• I coordinate and oversee project deadlines and ensure the fulfillment of key business milestones, such as sales launches, obtaining construction and urban planning permits, contract signings, and project commencement.
• I oversee the execution of comprehensive architectural and technical designs for housing and urban projects, spanning from initial conceptualization to detailed construction designs.
• I drive the use of advanced data analytics and business intelligence tools to develop data-driven management, control, and decision-making solutions, adapting to the dynamics and volatility of the current real estate market.
• I ensure timely acquisition of all necessary construction and urban planning permits by closely collaborating with relevant regulatory entities.
• I guarantee the quality and efficiency of housing and urban project studies and designs, ensuring they reflect client needs, preferences, and compliance with regulatory and technical standards.
• I implement the BIM methodology in projects, fostering multidisciplinary collaboration and optimizing design and construction processes to achieve superior results.
profile_positions.title: General Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Led a team of highly skilled professionals in project scheduling and budgeting. My focus was on consolidating and empowering the team, turning it into a high-performance unit with a strong track record within the organization. Through my leadership, I fostered the professional growth of talented team members, promoting them to positions of greater responsibility and recognition.
• Established rigorous standards of quality and technical accuracy in cost and schedule analysis. I developed and implemented advanced methodologies to ensure the integrity and reliability of budgets, optimizing available resources.
• Implemented innovative policies for market research and analysis of macroeconomic and microeconomic indicators. These actions allowed for accurate projections of cost trends in the construction industry, enabling us to anticipate market fluctuations and make informed and strategic decisions in times of high volatility and uncertainty.
• Utilized advanced data analytics and business intelligence solutions to build customized tools for analysis and decision-making. Leveraging these technologies, I extracted valuable information, identified patterns and trends, and provided data-driven strategic insights.
• Actively participated in bid evaluation committees, leveraging my industry knowledge and expertise in market analysis and benchmarking. I provided valuable and insightful information during the evaluation and selection process of suppliers and contractors.
• Generated historical records of purchases and acquisitions, constructing solid databases that served as a foundation for developing computational tools and cost indicators for parametric cost estimation in construction projects.
profile_positions.title: Estimating & Scheduling Director

profile_positions.description:
• Planned and scheduled major construction projects in the areas of residential, commercial, office, and urban development, with a cumulative built area exceeding 425.000 square meters.
• Developed comprehensive project plans and defined baseline value generation and investment flow to ensure efficient and successful project execution.
• Led the implementation of 4D and 5D Building Information Modeling (BIM) processes in organizational projects, utilizing advanced technologies to enhance project visualization, scheduling, and cost estimation.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams including architects, engineers, contractors, and stakeholders to ensure alignment of project objectives, timelines, and budgetary requirements.
• Successfully integrated BIM methodologies into project workflows, resulting in improved project coordination, cost control, and overall efficiency.
• Led and managed a team of professionals, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment.
profile_positions.title: Head of Project Scheduling

profile_positions.description:
• Developed comprehensive construction plans, scheduling, and budgets for flagship projects in urban infrastructure and building construction, with cumulative investments exceeding 50 million dollars. These projects spanned sectors such as commerce, housing, and industry, including shopping centers, office towers, residential complexes, hospitals, among others.
• Led the implementation of Building Information Modeling (BIM) methodologies applied to project planning, leveraging advanced technologies and software to enhance project visualization, coordination, and efficiency.
• Closely collaborated with interdisciplinary teams, including architects, engineers, contractors, and clients, to ensure alignment of project objectives, timelines, and budgetary requirements.
• Conducted thorough analysis and evaluations of project requirements, considering factors such as scope, resources, risks, and regulatory compliance, to develop accurate and realistic budgets and schedules.
• Actively participated in project meetings and provided expert advice in construction planning, scheduling, and budgeting, contributing to informed decision-making and proactive problem-solving.
• Facilitated staying up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in construction planning and BIM methodologies, continually seeking opportunities to improve project efficiency, accuracy, and quality.
profile_positions.title: Senior Construction Project Estimator & Scheduler

profile_positions.description:
• Successfully led and managed cost engineering projects for nationwide residential construction, overseeing the entire project lifecycle from inception to completion.
• Provided strategic guidance in cost engineering consulting and project planning, ensuring optimal resource utilization and adherence to budgetary limits.
• Developed and implemented comprehensive project plans, including schedules, budgets, and resource allocation, to ensure efficient and timely project delivery.
• Collaborated closely with interdisciplinary teams, including architects, engineers, and contractors, to foster strong working relationships and promote project success.
• Conducted regular progress assessments, monitoring key performance indicators and making necessary adjustments to mitigate risks and meet project objectives.
• Supervised and coordinated activities related to project scheduling, quality control, and compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations.
• Effectively communicated project updates and milestones to stakeholders, including clients, senior management, and internal teams, ensuring alignment and transparency throughout the project duration.
• Proactively identified and resolved issues, obstacles, and conflicts related to the project, employing innovative problem-solving skills to maintain project momentum and achieve desired results.
profile_positions.title: Cost Engineering Project Director

profile_positions.description:
• Directed and supervised budgeting and cost control activities for nationwide construction projects in the residential and industrial sectors.
• Monitored the execution of construction activities, ensuring adherence to scheduled timelines and budgeted costs.
• Implemented effective cost control measures to optimize project expenses and mitigate financial risks.
• Provided guidance and supervision to the budget and control team, overseeing their work and ensuring their professional development.
profile_positions.title: Estimation, Schedule & Cost Control Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
• Ensured seamless execution of luxury residential construction projects in Bogotá by closely monitoring progress and ensuring adherence to established timelines and budgetary constraints.
• Proactively identified and addressed any deficiencies or challenges, implementing effective corrective measures and process improvements to achieve project objectives.
• Coordinated the procurement of essential national and international goods and services for project execution, establishing relationships with suppliers in Italy, Germany, and the United States, optimizing sourcing strategies, and maintaining efficient supply chains.
profile_positions.title: Estimation, Schedule & Cost Control Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Prepared comprehensive construction estimates for building projects in the commercial, residential, and industrial sectors, including shopping centers, hotels, warehouses, office towers, residential complexes, hospitals, and more.
• Managed and oversaw multiple bidding processes for construction and infrastructure projects, such as roads, bridges, earthworks, docks, and utility networks.
• Developed detailed and accurate cost proposals, including budget structures, itemized quotations, and unit price analyses.
• Successfully compiled and organized the necessary legal, technical, and financial documentation for each bidding process.

response.job_title: Renewable Energy Systems | Process Engineer | Digitalisation Leader
response.summary:
As a curious engineer, my passion for research and design has driven my learning processes, allowing me to explore diverse fields and discover my deep interest in Energy & Resources Projects, especially those looking to accelerate a safer and greener energy future. That's why I enjoy contributing to motivated interdisciplinary teams with my abilities to delve into details and familiarize myself autonomously with uncommon subjects, always ready to face the next challenge.

After holding a variety of roles in different projects, superior organizational skills and a comprehensive understanding of teams' dynamics allow me to contribute to positive working atmospheres (always building on a good cup of coffee with the team).

Thanks to the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) and its scholarships, my communicative and intercultural skills have reached a level to perform ideally in contexts surrounded by different languages and cultures to create symbiotic relationships inter and intradisciplinary.

If you share my vision of a greener future and are willing to take hands-on shaping, let us get together to test our current "beta version" and grow up together. 

I'm right over at nico.miranda.h@gmail.com

AKA/Misspellings: Niklas, Nicholas, Nicolás.

company.name: IDOM Consulting, Engineering, Architecture
company.description:
IDOM is a leading multinational company providing professional services in consulting, engineering and architecture. One of its competitive advantages is the exceptional level of commitment it offers its clients, accompanying them through all phases of their projects.

Since its foundation in 1957, IDOM has worked on all five continents, carefully maintaining its independence from financial or interest groups, thus guaranteeing independence and impartiality in the global services delivered.

With a team of more than 5,000 professionals of 70 different nationalities, IDOM has the capacity and expertise to tackle complex large-scale projects with a multidisciplinary approach.

IDOM is an employee-owned organization with 968 partners form all areas and levels of the company. This ownership structure creates a culture of engagement and collaboration, breaking down the barriers of operating in a global market.

We’re one of the world’s leading communications services companies. At BT Group, the solutions we sell are integral to modern life. Our purpose is as simple as it is ambitious: we connect for good. 

There are no limits to what people can do when they connect. And as technology changes our world, connections are becoming even more important to everyday life.

company.name: Bancolombia
company.description:
Somos un grupo financiero latinoamericano que apoya los sueños de las personas y busca establecer con ellas relaciones duraderas, basadas en la confianza, la cercanía, el respeto, la inclusión y la calidez.

Escuchar, pensar en el otro y ser sensible a sus necesidades, nos ha llevado hacia una manera diferente de relacionarnos en la que todos somos importantes, porque no es lo mismo prestar servicios financieros que apoyar la construcción de proyectos de vida.

Continuamos avanzando en nuestro proceso de transformación. La meta es ser más para servir mejor a través de soluciones ágiles, simples e impecables. Para lograrlo, le estamos poniendo el alma.

response.job_title: Data Scientist, M.Sc.
response.summary: Industrial engineer, MSc. with 10+ years' experience, analytics fan with a superior focus on use data to gain insight helping others make informed business decisions. History of leading projects to reduce cost by increasing the labor productivity and process efficiency through data, with excellent leardeship, communication, interdisciplinary work and strategic thinking.
response.skills: Modelos estadísticos, Detección de anomalías, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Gestión del tiempo, Storytelling, Pensamiento lateral, Comunicación, Colaboración interdisciplinaria, Docencia, Docencia universitaria, Sector salud, BPM, Gestión de proyectos, Análisis, Microsoft Excel, Planificación estratégica, Trabajo en equipo, Microsoft Project, Estrategia, Ingeniería

profile_positions.description:
Project: Customer profiling based on anti-money laundering risk triggers .
Role: Principal Data Scientist
Team size: 1 business experts, 1 risk advisors
Task performed:
-	Research for different novel techniques.
-	Generate the data query with the information of all customers.
-	Implement the clustering model.
-	Profile each cluster.

Project: Estimation of the expected monthly activity and definition of alerts.
Role: Principal Data Scientist
Team size: 1 business experts, 1 risk advisors
Task performed:
-	Create queries for data required for the model.
-	Design and implement a time series forecast for customer monthly transactions.
-	Design alert scenarios for customers with anomalous behavior.

Project: AML crime detection using linking analysis and networking techniques.
Role: Principal Data Scientist
Team size: 2 business experts, 2 risk advisors, 1 Data Scientist
Task performed:
-	Research for different novel techniques.
-	Design node database with customer information and edge database with transactions and relationships.
-	Design and implement a model to detect anomaly patterns in nodes or communities.

Environment: Cloudera, Dataiku, SAS Guide, SAS Viya, Jupyter notebooks

company.name: Prosegur
company.description:
Prosegur is a world leader in the private security industry. Through its five business lines —Prosegur Security, Prosegur Cash, Prosegur Alarms, Cipher and Prosegur AVOS— it offers companies, households and retail businesses a security that they can trust, based on the most advanced solutions in the market. 

With presence on the five continents, Prosegur currently has a team of more than 150,000 employees. The company channels its social action through the Prosegur Foundation that works in four lines of activity: education, inclusion of people with disabilities into the job market, corporate volunteering and the promotion of culture.

company.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
company.description:
Launched in 2006, Amazon Web Services (AWS) began exposing key infrastructure services to businesses in the form of web services -- now widely known as cloud computing. The ultimate benefit of cloud computing, and AWS, is the ability to leverage a new business model and turn capital infrastructure expenses into variable costs. Businesses no longer need to plan and procure servers and other IT resources weeks or months in advance. Using AWS, businesses can take advantage of Amazon's expertise and economies of scale to access resources when their business needs them, delivering results faster and at a lower cost.

Today, Amazon Web Services provides a highly reliable, scalable, low-cost infrastructure platform in the cloud that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses in 190 countries around the world. With data center locations in the U.S., Europe, Singapore, and Japan, customers across all industries are taking advantage of our low cost, elastic, open and flexible, secure platform.

company.name: Stepan Company
company.description:
Stepan Company's vision is to create innovative solutions for a cleaner, healthier, more energy efficient world. We want to accomplish that vision by partnering with you. As a publicly-traded, international manufacturer of specialty and intermediate chemical products, we collaborate with our customers to bring high-quality products that drive growth in the consumer space and functional markets such as construction, oilfield, agriculture, paints and coatings. 

Since 1932, Stepan continues to be a mainstay in the industry, committed to developing sustainable practices and products that reflect our core values: responsibility, integrity and innovation. By always putting you – the customer – first, we bring continuous improvement to the chemical industry and our global community. 

Stepan is headquartered in the Greater Chicagoland area (Northfield, IL). We provide timely customer support anywhere in the world by utilizing state-of-the-art manufacturing, and research and development facilities, along with a robust distribution network throughout North and South America, Europe and Asia.
